mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jwf_formhistory ( FormInstID, FieldName, FieldType, Revision, RegID, RegDate, ModID, ModDate, ModValue ) VALUES ( #{FormInstID}, #{FieldName}, #{FieldType}, #{Revision}, #{RegID}, SYSDATE, #{ModID}, SYSDATE, #{ModValue} )

INSERT INTO jwf_formhistory ( FormInstID, FieldName, FieldType, Revision, RegID, RegDate, ModID, ModDate, ModValue ) SELECT #{FormInstID} AS FormInstID,
'FileInfos',
#{FieldName},
#{FieldType} AS FieldType, #{Revision}, #{RegID}, SYSDATE, #{ModID}, SYSDATE,
AttachFileInfo BodyContext AppliedDate AppliedTerm ApprovalLine DocClassID DocClassName DocLevel DocLinks DocNo FileInfos DocSummary EDMSDocLinks EntCode EntName FileInfos InitiatorID InitiatorName InitiatorUnitID InitiatorUnitName isModApprovalLine IsPublic ReceiptList ReceiveNames ReceiveNo SaveTerm Subject
FROM jwf_forminstance WHERE FormInstID = #{FormInstID}

INSERT INTO jwf_formhistory ( FormInstID, FieldName, FieldType, Revision, RegID, RegDate, ModID, ModDate, ModValue ) VALUES ( #{FormInstID}, #{FieldName}, #{FieldType}, #{Revision}, #{RegID}, TO_DATE(#{RegDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{ModID}, TO_DATE(#{ModDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{ModValue} )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(( SELECT Revision FROM ( SELECT Revision FROM jwf_formhistory WHERE FormInstID = #{FormInstID} ORDER BY Revision DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM = 1), 0)+1 AS "Revision" FROM dual

SELECT #{FormInstID} AS "FormInstID", #{FieldName} AS "FieldName", #{FieldType} AS "FieldType", #{Revision} AS "Revision", #{RegID} AS "RegID", TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "RegDate", #{ModID} AS "ModID", TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "ModDate", DomainDataContext AS "ModValue" FROM jwf_domaindata WHERE ProcessID = #{ProcessID}
